coreAttributes.name: Snake Oil
coreAttributes.description: A clear glass bottle containing a bright blue liquid. The label on this 'Genuine Snake Oil' makes outrageous promises as to its efficacy as a panacea, and declares it as being suitable 'For both internal and external application'.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.4)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the cap from the bottle of Snake Oil, before tilting [npc.her] head back and bringing it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. A scent of peppermint and other assorted herbs rises from the opening, and with a gulp, [npc.name] [npc.verb(start)] downing the liquid, discovering that its taste is more or less what could be expected from the smell. While indeed feeling somewhat refreshed, [npc.name] [npc.sheIs] feeling somewhat let down by the advertising.
